archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0426
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS Solution, I want to be able to apply a credit limit to a customer billing acccount so that I may manage commercial risk to revenue.

properties.value: Open point: to be clearified whether the limit is to be manually set case by case or there should be some algorithm to set the limit

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
